description: Starts a Device Advisor test suite run. Requires permission to access the StartSuiteRun action.

parameters.name: suiteDefinitionId
parameters.description: Suite definition ID of the test suite.

parameters.name: suiteRunConfiguration
parameters.description: Suite run configuration. Sets the primary device for the test suite run. This requires a thing ARN or a certificate ARN. thingArn (string) --- Lists device's thing ARN. certificateArn (string) --- Lists device's certificate ARN. deviceRoleArn (string) --- Lists device's role ARN. selectedTestList (list) --- Sets test case list. (string) --- parallelRun (boolean) --- TRUE if multiple test suites run in parallel.

nested_params.name: primaryDevice
nested_params.description: Sets the primary device for the test suite run. This requires a thing ARN or a certificate ARN.

nested_params.name: parallelRun
nested_params.description: TRUE if multiple test suites run in parallel.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags to be attached to the suite run. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: suiteRunId
nested_items.description: Suite Run ID of the started suite run.

nested_items.name: suiteRunArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the started suite run.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: Starts a Device Advisor test suite run based on suite create time.

nested_items.name: endpoint
nested_items.description: The response of an Device Advisor test endpoint.
